titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Triasulfuron Technical.
To suspend temporarily the duty on Triasulfuron Technical.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Triasulfuron Technical 3-(6-methoxy-4-methyl-1,3,5-triazin-2-yl)-1-[2-(2-chloroethoxy)phenylsulfonyl]-urea (Triasulfuron Technical).
